imdb.title: Rozario to banpaia
imdb.plot: Tskune accidentally gets on a bus to a school of monsters.

episodes.title: Reunion and a Vampire
episodes.plot: Tsukune's back at the academy for another year! Moka's popularity has only grown, but that could be a problem - one of the letters in her locker is a death threat!

episodes.title: Little Sister and a Vampire
episodes.plot: The new girl at school shares quite a history with Moka - they're sisters! Back in the day, Moka was able to defeat her younger sibling every time they sparred. Now it looks like Kokoa is out for vengeance!

episodes.title: Mother and Daughter and a Vampire
episodes.plot: It's Parents Day at the school and there's drama in the air! Kurumi and Mizore's mothers don't get along, and they get a little crazy when they learn that both of their daughters are into Tsukune.

episodes.title: Body Measurement and a Vampire
episodes.plot: Yukari's feeling down about her under-developed body, so Mako helps out with a little magic. Yukari's new look makes quite a splash at school - but she still can't seem to catch Tsukune's eye!

episodes.title: Curry and a Vampire
episodes.plot: Mizore's not having fun in cooking class; the group is making curry, and she's not into spicy foods. She's missing out on the culinary adventure, but she'll see action soon enough when she has to save the school!

episodes.title: Field Trip and a Vampire
episodes.plot: Tsukune's gang heads to the hot springs on a field trip. Meanwhile, a rough and tumble rival school has set its sights on the Academy - and they've got an agent on the inside!

episodes.title: Bathroom and a Vampire
episodes.plot: Tsukune goes to see his mom, who sees exactly what her son is up against when the girls start showing up in skimpy outfits! Later, Tsukune's cousin sets up a contest for the girls - and the winner gets Tsukune!

episodes.title: Youth and a Vampire
episodes.plot: It's an episode of super-short mini-episodes! The subjects include shopping, recollections into the past, superheroism, bike riding, clashing taste buds, puppies, mini-skirts, and more!

episodes.title: Skiing and a Vampire
episodes.plot: A ski trip turns into disaster when Kokoa goes after Moka in the snow! After a massive avalanche roars down the mountain, Tsukune becomes trapped in a cave - and he's not alone.

episodes.title: Bishounen and a Vampire
episodes.plot: The popular new boy in school is making waves with Tsukune's girls. It's easy to see there's something fishy going on, but the ladies seem to be powerless against his smooth-talking charm.

episodes.title: Lilith Mirror and a Vampire
episodes.plot: Tsukune's sister stops by the Academy for a visit, but chaos ensues when she gets her hands on a special mirror that has the power to reveal the true nature of the student body.

episodes.title: Sealing and a Vampire
episodes.plot: Moka sacrifices her own rosary to seal the deteriorating barrier between the human world and the monster world. Will she ever be able to contain her true identity again?

episodes.title: Cross and Family and a Vampire
episodes.plot: If they ever hope to see the sweet side of Moka again, Tsukune and the girls must survive the perilous journey through the demon world to confront a monster whose powers are even greater than Moka's!

episodes.title: Shin seikatsu to banpaia
episodes.plot: The good news? Tsukune Aono has just been accepted to the Youkai Academy, and he's made a cute new friend on his first day. The bad news? It's a school for monsters, and his new friend is actually a vampire. In over his head and out of his league, if his humanity is discovered he'll be monster chow. Blood will be drunk and bonds will be formed as Tsukune discovers that some lines were meant to be crossed, and friendship comes not from what you are, but from what's in your heart.

episodes.title: Muma to banpaia
episodes.plot: Tsukune's started acting weird and getting too close for comfort to another girl, who's actually a mind-controlling succubus! Will Moka straighten out Tsukune's senses, or is he doomed to be the brainwashed boytoy of a badass batwinged babe with bouncing bodacious boobs?

episodes.title: Majokko to Banpaia
episodes.plot: A mischievous young witch stirs up trouble between Moka and Tsukune, but will a ghastly confrontation with a trio of lizardmen change her outlook on love?

episodes.title: Sayonara to banpaia
episodes.plot: The boys who make up Moka's fan club decide it's time to get rid of Tsukune, who is mortified that his puny stature makes him unable to protect his special lady friends!

episodes.title: Sukuuru mizugi to banpaia
episodes.plot: Tsukune's interest in the school swimming club is a big problem for Moka. It seems water has a strange effect on vampires, and a quick dip in the pool could sap her powers!

episodes.title: Shinbun bu to banpaia
episodes.plot: There's a rumor going around that Tsukune is the creep sneaking glances at other girls. Kurumu and Yukari get to the heart of the matter to clear his name.

episodes.title: Yukionna to banpaia
episodes.plot: Mizore Shirayuki is a shy, soft-spoken snow woman. This sultry stalker has set her sights on Tsukune, and she's got sub-zero tolerance for anyone who gets in the way. Can Tsukune get her to chill out, or will Moka get left out in the cold?

episodes.title: Suugaku to banpaia
episodes.plot: Private lessons from Tsukune's seductive math teacher start subtracting from his personality. At odds with the situation, Moka's got to snap him out of it before the hungry mentor really sinks her teeth in.

episodes.title: Natsuyasumi to banpaia
episodes.plot: Summer vacation calls the Newspaper Club to a beach in the human world. Yukari is tempted to ditch school and join Ruby, a witch living in a coveted sunflower field nearby. Trouble brews as Tsukune attempts to break the spell.

episodes.title: Himawari to banpaia
episodes.plot: Ruby explains the plight of the sunflower fields to Yukari's rescuers, who prove to be a curiously kind bunch. All seems to be kosher after the confusion the night before, until a forbidden spell is unleashed.

episodes.title: Shin gakki to banpaia
episodes.plot: Summer vacation is over and the Newspaper Club is trying to get back to work. Unfortunately, they find their efforts complicated by the meddlesome Public Safety Commission.

episodes.title: Kouan Iin kai to banpaia
episodes.plot: The Newspaper Club's attempt to expose the corruption of the Public Safety Commission backfires in a big way when Tsukune is arrested and accused of being human!

episodes.title: Tsukion to banpaia
episodes.plot: Tsukune's life is on the line! Moka makes an amazing attempt to save him, and finds an unlikely ally in her mission to prevent his execution.
